code: import*as actionTypes from'../types/ui';export function showModal(modal){return{type:actionTypes.SHOW_MODAL,modal:modal};}export function hideModal(){return{type:actionTypes.HIDE_MODAL};}export function hideModals(){return{type:actionTypes.HIDE_MODALS};}export function showLoader(message){return{type:actionTypes.SHOW_LOADER,message:message};}export function hideLoader(){return{type:actionTypes.HIDE_LOADER};}
